name: OpenBuild
fullText:
Are you ready to join the wave of innovation as BTCFi enters a pivotal growth phase?

Join us in the afternoon of Sunday, August 10, at Shenzhen Bay Science & Technology Park, where @GOATRollup ’s CEO and CTO will be onsite to share the core technology and ecosystem https://t.co/106DPVcVxH

name: allincrypto 熬鹰资本 🇨🇳
fullText:
总共就这么几手操作，基本全是币股类的。
现在美股和加密市场比较同频，流动性也挺好。
正常的买卖股票也做，期权也做，都做着玩儿。
交割单就在这里。 https://t.co/mgy8eP2ynW
